Summary: It looked a fireball with a tail and then it got bright and disapeard.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a ball of fire in the sky and then was gone. there where Aircraft in the air for about an hour and that was it.Im not the first to sight this fire like UFO in the River Valley in Fort Smith Arkansas.Very Scary &#!+.
